enroll_customer.acceptspecialoffer: Yes, Ohio Natural Gas may send me information about special offers from Ohio Natural Gas and its marketing partners.
enroll_customer.confirmationcontent:
[

We are currently processing your transfer of service request. A confirmation email will be sent shortly. If there are any issues\, we will contact you to remedy them.

Once your order is completed\, you will receive your written agreement\, including your Terms and Conditions of Service\, in the mail. In addition\, your local distribution company will send you a letter confirming your Ohio Natural Gas enrollment.

Thank you for choosing Ohio Natural Gas to be your natural gas supplier.

]
enroll_customer.deltaconfirmationcontent: You have selected to provide us with your Delta Skymiles account number later. When you are ready, please go to onlyong.com/skymiles.html to enter your number to get your bonus miles.
enroll_customer.deltaofferterms: * bonus miles offer limited to qualified new customers who use 25,000 Ccf/2,500 Mcf per year or less enrolling on an eligible price plan by  using applicable promotion code. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Choice program through their natural gas utility company. ONG rates do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.866.466.4487, write to Ohio Natural Gas, PO Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit www.onlyong.com. Early termination charges apply for residential fixed price plans (12-Month plan: $150/$75; 6-Month plan: $75) and commercial fixed price plans (12-Month plan:  $300/$150; 6-Month plan: $150.) 30 days of continuous active gas service with ONG required to receive  bonus miles. Cannot be combined with any other offer. You must be a SkyMiles member and provide your SkyMiles account number to ONG to participate in this program and earn miles. In addition to bonus miles, two miles will be awarded for each dollar spent for ONG supplier gas charges for monthly gas service. Miles will not be awarded for taxes or one-time charges such as late fees. SkyMiles Medallion® Members will be awarded one additional mile for eligible charges. Miles will be posted to your SkyMiles account up to 4 weeks after each monthly bill date, provided you are an active customer of ONG and remain in good standing in the SkyMiles program. By enrolling in this program, you are authorizing the sharing of your information with Delta for the purpose of completing your enrollment and continuing your participation in the program. Visit onlyong.com/skymiles for program terms and conditions. All SkyMiles program rules apply. To review the rules, please visit Membership Guide & Program Rules at www.delta.com/memberguide. All ONG program rules, and Delta prices and SkyMiles rules, are subject to change without notice. Taxes and fees for Award Travel are the responsibility of the passenger and must be paid at the time the ticket is booked. Award Travel seats are limited and may not be available on all flights or in all markets. Delta, SkyMiles, and the Delta logo are registered service marks of Delta Air Lines, Inc. Delta is not responsible for goods or services offered by any companies participating in miles promotions. Partner offers subject to the terms and conditions of each individual offer. See individual offers for details. Offers void where prohibited by law. Other restrictions may apply. Ohio Natural Gas and Delta Air Lines, Inc. are not affiliated, and neither has any obligation or liability with respect to the products or services to be provided by the other.
enroll_customer.donthaveskymilesnum: Don’t have your SkyMiles Number at the Moment?
enroll_customer.donthaveskymilesnumdesc: If you do not have your Delta SkyMiles Number with you, you may enter it later. You have until xx/xx/xxxx to get us your SkyMiles number. Instructions on how they can give it to you later should display here
enroll_customer.footernote: You may rescind your enrollment without penalty within 7 business days of the postmark date of your written agreement by contacting the utility by phone or in writing. If any of the information above is not correct or you have additional questions, please call Ohio Natural Gas at 1.888.466.4427 and reference the Confirmation Number shown above.
enroll_customer.header: You are eligible for a Bonus Offer
enroll_customer.headercontent:
Welcome to Ohio Natural Gas!

Please check the account number you entered below. If it is incorrect, please go back and re-enter.
enroll_customer.headerdesc: Switch to Ohio Natural Gas and start earning with Delta SkyMiles®. Ohio Natural Gas is excited to be a Delta SkyMiles partner and the only Gas Supplier in Ohio with whom you can earn miles just for paying your natural gas bill.
enroll_customer.howitworks:
How It Works

  • Customers will now earn TWO miles for every dollar spent on their ONG supplier natural gas charges (excluding sales tax and one-time charges)!
  • And, if you are a Delta SkyMiles® Medallion® member, Delta will award an additional mile for each dollar spent as described above!
  • It’s easy to start participating. Simply enter your ONG account and SkyMiles member information below. If you’d prefer to enroll by phone, call ONG (toll-free) at 1.888.466.4427 and mention that you would like to enroll in ONG’s Delta SkyMiles partnership program. Please have your SkyMiles account number handy when you call.

Frequently Asked Questions >

Delta Program Terms & Conditions >

Join Delta Skymiles >
enroll_customer.offersubheading: $25 Visa Reward Card offer is available to new residential customers enrolling online with Ohio Natural Gas between 12/1/2017 and 12/31/2017 using applicable promotion code. Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the Visa Reward Card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Cannot be combined with any other offer. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.888.466.4427, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com.
enroll_customer.offerterms: $25 Visa Reward Card offer is available to new residential customers enrolling online with Ohio Natural Gas between 10/1/2017 and 10/31/2017 using applicable promotion code. Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the Visa Reward Card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Cannot be combined with any other offer. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.888.466.44427, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com.
enroll_customer.rafcontent: If a friend referred you to ONG and shared a 5-6 digit referral code, please enter it here.
enroll_customer.rafofferheading: Want to earn $25 Visa Reward cards?
enroll_customer.rafoffersubheading:
You can share this rate with your friends through our Refer-a-Friend program, and for each friend who signs up with us, you can both receive a $25 Visa Reward card.

 Hurry, the rate you received will only remain available through 12-31-2017.

 Click below to receive an email with information about the Refer-a-Friend program, or continue with your enrollment without participating.
enroll_customer.rafofferterms: * Subject to the Refer-a-Friend program (“RAF Program”) rules and terms and conditions. Offer limited to: (i) qualified new residential/commercial customers (each a “Referee”) who use a promotion code through this RAF Program to enroll in an eligible ONG price plan (each a “RAF Referee”), and (ii) existing customers who refer one or more Referees using the RAF Program (each a “Referrer”). Referrers may earn a $25 Visa® Reward Card for each Referee who: (i) enrolls on an eligible ONG price plan, (ii) provides Referrer’s Referral Code at enrollment, and (iii) begins burning gas on an eligible ONG price plan. Referrers must: have either an active or pending account with ONG when Referee begins burning gas; authenticate their ONG account; accept the RAF Program terms and conditions; and participate by using the communication methods provided (email, Facebook, and Twitter) at onlyong.com/promo-raf and as specified in the RAF Program terms and conditions. RAF Referees earn a $25 Visa Reward Card by: (i) enrolling in an eligible ONG price plan, (ii) providing the RAF Program promotion code at enrollment (and may enter their Referrer’s unique Referral Code at that time), and (iii) reaching 60 days of continuous active service with ONG on such eligible price plan. Allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Maximum award: $500 in Visa Reward Cards per person / calendar year for all ONG Visa Reward Card promotional offers. Offer valid for qualifying enrollments processed by ONG between 12/01/2017 and 06/30/2018. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Choice program through their natural gas utility company. ONG rates do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.888.466.4427, write to Ohio Natural Gas, PO Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit www.onlyong.com. RAF Referees cannot combine this offer with any other offer but may provide the Referrer’s unique Referral Code when enrolling using another ONG promotional offer. Referrers may combine this offer with their pre-existing discounts and promotions. The Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer’s terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. © 2017 Ohio Natural Gas. All Rights Reserved.
